name: Film deemed original record
text: Such photograph, microphotograph, or reproduction on film shall be deemed to be an original record for all purposes, including introduction in evidence in all courts or administrative agencies.  A transcript, exemplification, facsimile, or certified copy thereof shall, for all purposes recited herein, be deemed to be a transcript, exemplification, facsimile, or certified copy of the original record. [L 1945, c 26, pt of §1; RL 1955, §7-6; HRS ]
